SourcedStatement: Officials at the plant told Morning Edition that the army is producing 36,000 shells a month, up from 24,000 just six months ago.
Name: the plant

SourcedStatement: Officials at Tobyhanna estimate that its average annual salary is $30,000 higher than the average salary in northeastern Pennsylvania, which is around $58,000 in 2021.
Name: Tobyhanna

SourcedStatement: “We’re all about quality jobs, and that’s a quality organization,”
Name: Bob Durkin
Title: president and chief executive officer of the Scranton Chamber of Commerce

SourcedStatement: “It’s not $277 million that stays here. But, you know, it’s a good chunk of it,”
Name: Matt Cartwright
Title: Congressman
Justification: who sits on the House Appropriations Committee and represents Scranton and other parts of Northeastern Pennsylvania

SourcedStatement: “I don’t really think that people dwell or concentrate on anything that’s going on outside of their sphere of influence,”
Name: Rich Hansen
Title: Commander’s Representative at the Scranton Army Ammunition Plant

SourcedStatement: “We had a job fair in the middle of a heat wave and there was still a line going out of the door,”
Name: Danielle Weinschenk
Title: lead Public Affairs Specialist at the Tobyhanna Army Depot

SourcedStatement: “We had another one when it was pouring rain, and the same thing happened.”
Name: Danielle Weinschenk
Title: lead Public Affairs Specialist at the Tobyhanna Army Depot

SourcedStatement: “With the Ukraine support, you know, one day I was sitting there thinking about what needs to be done, and it kind of hit me that what we were doing directly affects whether people live or die,”
Name: Jim Jarick
Title: senior technology center engineer at the Tobyhanna Army Depot

SourcedStatement: “If we aren’t doing our job correctly, people could die tomorrow. And that just put this whole thing in perspective for me.”
Name: Jim Jarick
Title: senior technology center engineer at the Tobyhanna Army Depot

SourcedStatement: “At the height of last year’s counteroffensive, the Ukrainians were firing about 6,000 a day,”
Name: Mark Cancian
Title: senior advisor at the Center for Strategic and International Studies

SourcedStatement: “The Russians are [firing] probably about 10,000 a day.”
Name: Mark Cancian
Title: senior advisor at the Center for Strategic and International Studies

SourcedStatement: “Our first task is to save our people,”
Name: Olksandr Popov
Title: commander of a Ukrainian artillery unit
